data.prayer: Spirit, protect the overcomers in Huludao, Liaoning, China, so that they will one day sit with Jesus on His throne.
data.verse: He who overcomes, I will give to him to sit down with me on my throne, as I also overcame, and sat down with my Father on his throne.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Huludao, Liaoning, China
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the county of Huludao to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.section_summary: On average, 53 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Huludao, Liaoning, China.
data.prayer: Father, send your gospel to these.
Spirit, train the church of Huludao, Liaoning, China to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

data.prayer: the county of Huludao has (about) 53,808 people who know Jesus, 11,459 people who know about him culturally, and 644,033 people who are far from Jesus.

Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Xibe, Western people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Xibe, Western people.
Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the county of Huludao access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the county of Huludao to exponentially multiply disciples.
Jesus, make yourself known to the 709,300 people living in Huludao through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.
